trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Peru
There were no other sightings in Peru on or around September 2nd 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife went out to get the paper before work about 6:15 am. She came back in the house and wanted me to come outside and view an object flashing red and green. I observed this star like object at about 120-125 degrees on the compass and about 30-35 degrees inclination. This object appeared to be moving with the normal star field motion. I watched this object for about 15 minutes before I went back inside. This object continued to flash red and green. The object was smaller than Jupiter in the sky, but had a more intense brilliance.
Summary: star like object flashing red and green
